page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT RESULTS
page.content: Results of our survey. House wife 34 Industrial 4 Unemployed 4 Farming 16 Selfemployed 6 Services 58 Total number surveyed-132sets of parents. It was not possible to survey the whole D-block on this topic,because the local inhabitants are a proud race of people and would be offended by this kind of question if they were unfortunate enough to be 'between jobs'. When we telephoned the Job-Centre, they told us that there are over 2000 people unemployed in the whole Camelford area.That area is much much larger than our D-block.
